lead_paragraph: Alex Richter scored 26 points, and Daniel Jansen had 25 to lead Augustana of South Dakota to the N.C.A.A. Division II championship, 90-81, over top-ranked Lincoln Memorial of Tennessee in Frisco, Tex.

headline.main: Augustana Captures N.C.A.A. Division II Championship

snippet: Alex Richter scored 26 points, and Daniel Jansen had 25 to lead Augustana of South Dakota to the N.C.A.A. Division II championship, 90-81, over top-ranked Lincoln Memorial of Tennessee in Frisco, Tex.
abstract: Augustana defeats Lincoln Memorial, 90-81, to win NCAA Division II basketball championship.
